interactivity.requirements: Choose to pursue Haruka during either Invisible Worm or Roses
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Whispers of the World " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " So Far Below " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose not to pursue Haruka during either Invisible Worm or Roses . Replaced by Personal Hell .

progression.synopsis: Haruka is half-mad with the happiness after the news about her husband, although she had not a slightest idea what her close friend was going through right now. So Haruka rings Sensei and asks him to come over, as she has so few people to share the news with. And so, Sensei comes to visit Haruka at her house and has to hear her perception on the current events. In the end, Sensei returns home safe and gets a phone call from Maki, she said she was sorry for the yelling. Sensei asked her not to apologize and agreed to help with improving Makoto 's mental state.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .25p2.
